subject: Golf
United States Open (Golf)
organizations: Chambers Bay Golf Course (University Place, Wash)
lead_paragraph: After Johnson missed a 12-foot putt for eagle and a win on the last hole and pulled the 4-foot comebacker that would have forced an 18-hole playoff with Jordan Spieth, all he wanted to do was disappear.
snippet: After Johnson missed a 12-foot putt for eagle and a win on the last hole and pulled the 4-foot comebacker that would have forced an 18-hole playoff with Jordan Spieth, all he wanted to do was disappear.
